lessons.title: SPIKE TA1 The Light Matrix
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Learn how to display a smiley face on the Hub.
lessons.lesson_description: Learn how to display a smiley face on the Hub.

text.content: Learn how to display a smiley face on the Hub.
Create the program that displays a smiley face.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA1_LIGHT_GHOST
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="10" ishorizontal="false"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenProgramStarts" id="xfnnkSYu3qL63WTabK3B" x="331" y="105"><next><block type="flipperdisplay_ledMatrix" id="ZIA|{=3qStEI6h_7u#He"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperdisplay_custom-matrix-port" id="V+q@hU=2JXR#Fz=,96z9"><field name="field_flipperdisplay_custom-matrix-port">M1</field></shadow></value><value name="MATRIX"><shadow type="flipperdisplay_custom-matrix" id="?E9AWdER1KSyaT[DB]L?"><field name="field_flipperdisplay_custom-matrix">9909999099000009000909990</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to test the program that displays a smiley face.
The Hub displays a smiley face.
Change the light pattern to match this one.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA_Light_Blink
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperdisplay_ledMatrix" id="P5-b`Y#W.3uvIYCw`Iq+" x="113" y="293"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperdisplay_custom-matrix-port" id="Z4-b$#w0~UYo;%UICiVn"><field name="field_flipperdisplay_custom-matrix-port">M1</field></shadow></value><value name="MATRIX"><shadow type="flipperdisplay_custom-matrix" id="5dOJRP{L),i[.We6(DNs"><field name="field_flipperdisplay_custom-matrix">0009999099000009000909990</field></shadow></value></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to see your new light pattern.

lessons.title: SPIKE TA2 The Motor
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Learn how to make a motor turn.​
lessons.lesson_description: Learn how to make a motor turn.​

text.content: Learn how to make a motor turn.​
Plug a motor into Port A.​
Create the program to start the motor.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA2_MOTOR_GHOST
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenProgramStarts" id="cIlQZI3n0jx2dEeIxWcw" x="-130" y="120"><next><block type="flippermotor_motorSetSpeed" id="Z`HRuwY%!UdJsCzIFRl{"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flippermotor_multiple-port-selector" id="[r#RQ@k?eXHbo44/=/+v"><field name="field_flippermotor_multiple-port-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="SPEED"><shadow type="math_number" id="DCay4,{rAzP}:RQUZg0v"><field name="NUM">20</field></shadow></value><next><block type="flippermotor_motorTurnForDirection" id="_+BrlSz![zr-k.Mi-rjC"><field name="UNIT">rotations</field><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flippermotor_multiple-port-selector" id="-ji7P!n#[=]:apvv.AaA"><field name="field_flippermotor_multiple-port-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="DIRECTION"><shadow type="flippermotor_custom-icon-direction" id="N)JW?Vb/1|u*v5]|M-Rk"><field name="field_flippermotor_custom-icon-direction">clockwise</field></shadow></value><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number" id="I7Qu;k}a@kY~vuo(b9i!"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to test the program that starts the motor.​
The motor is turning.​
Change the speed to make the motor turn faster.​

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA_Motor_Faster
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flippermotor_motorSetSpeed" id="!VIE7`Ps%6KqiU?NsLN]" x="21" y="192"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flippermotor_multiple-port-selector" id="*E(kk_9Ng}tz)%nX#m8k"><field name="field_flippermotor_multiple-port-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="SPEED"><shadow type="math_number" id="iKvNX{KeGQQpXnT/zOqa"><field name="NUM">75</field></shadow></value></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to see the motor turn faster.

lessons.title: SPIKE TA3 The Color Sensor
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Learn how to use the Color Sensor.​
lessons.lesson_description: Learn how to use the Color Sensor.​

text.content: Learn how to use the Color Sensor.​
Plug the Color Sensor into Port A.​
Create the program that uses the Color Sensor to light up the Hub.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA3_COLOR_SENSOR_GHOST
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenColor" id="Ae!WA))a#1@E@i]C~0mW" x="101" y="154"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperevents_color-sensor-selector" id="-0nMc9(jX[#p{;^g,p(:"><field name="field_flipperevents_color-sensor-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="OPTION"><shadow type="flipperevents_color-selector" id="UTR^1]({7^v8E3+{ASPe"><field name="field_flipperevents_color-selector">9</field></shadow></value><next><block type="flipperdisplay_ledMatrixFor" id=";5Aska]:7!NzRu(VL6Q`"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperdisplay_custom-matrix-port" id="m-(U3cD7R!VuGq|zR*Kl"><field name="field_flipperdisplay_custom-matrix-port">M1</field></shadow></value><value name="MATRIX"><shadow type="flipperdisplay_custom-matrix" id="q9^}AIk0b_r;[FPODP,$"><field name="field_flipperdisplay_custom-matrix">9909999099000009000909990</field></shadow></value><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number" id="s(Mh.TNIQ][q}ukeJiLK"><field name="NUM">2</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to run the program.

Hold a red brick in front of the Color Sensor. ​

​Watch the Hub light up.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA_Color_yellow
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenColor" id="E)OKn{%FSx:*GZ*Lf~yb" x="199" y="193"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperevents_color-sensor-selector" id="qJz!uCk3spDc|z_Igcnb"><field name="field_flipperevents_color-sensor-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="OPTION"><shadow type="flipperevents_color-selector" id=",dXH_IY{(P!AmfAN|D%%"><field name="field_flipperevents_color-selector">7</field></shadow></value></block></xml>

text.content:
Change the color on the programming block from red to yellow.

The Color Sensor will now react to a yellow brick.
Press the Play Button and use a yellow brick to test the Color Sensor.

lessons.title: SPIKE TA4 The Distance Sensor
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Learn how to use the Distance Sensor.
lessons.lesson_description: Learn how to use the Distance Sensor.

text.content: Learn how to use the Distance Sensor.
Plug the Distance Sensor into Port A.​
Create the program that uses the Distance Sensor to make the Hub beep.​

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA4_DISTANCE_SENSOR_GHOST
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenDistance" id="Cm,1WQ3$wS.+96R;1R;9" x="70" y="165"><field name="COMPARATOR"><</field><field name="UNIT">%</field><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperevents_distance-sensor-selector" id="[m/sKaBu^P@CO;juhh5L"><field name="field_flipperevents_distance-sensor-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number" id="5x_d=rWg)f0Td?V3YuAd"><field name="NUM">8</field></shadow></value><next><block type="flippersound_beepForTime" id="y%^5q;NN}n]g6EyR`o]~"><value name="NOTE"><shadow type="flippersound_custom-piano" id="8h[Ahw{]rLf=pB/VXBcF"><field name="field_flippersound_custom-piano">60</field></shadow></value><value name="DURATION"><shadow type="math_number" id="RF%rwNp7fWw2E~WAnf7a"><field name="NUM">0.2</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to run the program.​

Hold your hand in front of the Distance Sensor.

Hear the Hub make a beep.

Change the distance on the programming block to a higher number.

Now the Distance Sensor will react from farther away.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA_Distance_Farther
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenDistance" id=".Uxgfw;Y_oAx)sem.L`m" x="179" y="189"><field name="COMPARATOR"><</field><field name="UNIT">%</field><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperevents_distance-sensor-selector" id="%MUzE?((Rhvy}]ON{tAO"><field name="field_flipperevents_distance-sensor-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number" id="9r-N?cO)g|]`*cE{7k9$"><field name="NUM">20</field></shadow></value></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button and hold your hand in front of the Distance Sensor.

lessons.title: SPIKE TA5 The Force Sensor
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Learn how to use the Force Sensor.​
lessons.lesson_description: Learn how to use the Force Sensor.​

text.content: Learn how to use the Force Sensor.​

Plug a motor into Port A.
Plug the Force Sensor into Port B.
Create the program that uses the Force Sensor to make the motor turn.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA5_FORCE_SENSOR_GHOST
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenPressed" id="0+rA5AE7iFVx/kasFHgp" x="-130" y="94"><field name="OPTION">pressed</field><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperevents_force-sensor-selector" id="Mzj7gArh42ck-Gag-4V:"><field name="field_flipperevents_force-sensor-selector">B</field></shadow></value><next><block type="flippermotor_motorStartDirection" id="S2h9w`n!k#eH2gUL?Y#h"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flippermotor_multiple-port-selector" id="[Lt2qfV7DZbj}:X[CN;Y"><field name="field_flippermotor_multiple-port-selector">A</field></shadow></value><value name="DIRECTION"><shadow type="flippermotor_custom-icon-direction" id="(EBo$YX#7s#WHKAvjYLs"><field name="field_flippermotor_custom-icon-direction">clockwise</field></shadow></value></block></next></block><block type="flipperevents_whenPressed" id="mmU^!?MWs:]BSTkJdL~k" x="-132" y="327"><field name="OPTION">released</field><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flipperevents_force-sensor-selector" id="5IOkMotZf}2Dx.+Cs4A@"><field name="field_flipperevents_force-sensor-selector">B</field></shadow></value><next><block type="flippermotor_motorStop" id="h#To2dgy,uOm0e#hX{E?"><value name="PORT"><shadow type="flippermotor_multiple-port-selector" id="@1i|oM;e~=24R|AW);!8"><field name="field_flippermotor_multiple-port-selector">A</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to run the program.
Press the Force Sensor to make the motor turn.

lessons.title: SPIKE TA6 The Gyro Sensor
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Learn how to use the Gyro Sensor.
lessons.lesson_description: Learn how to use the Gyro Sensor.

text.content: Learn how to use the Gyro Sensor.
Inside the Hub, there’s a built-in Gyro Sensor. It can register movement and tilts.
Create the program that uses the Gyro Sensor to make a sound effect play.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA6_GYRO_SENSOR_GHOST
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenTilted" id="9ToQbQ^yIz!kypwV]Ps5" x="-81" y="160"><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="flipperevents_custom-tilted" id="`P1Qw9y}z?bUhY)HK7!d"><field name="field_flipperevents_custom-tilted">4</field></shadow></value><next><block type="flippersound_playSound" id="fBcpv9br83KY:JaFBR+:"><value name="SOUND"><shadow type="flippersound_sound-selector" id="?;)?,WU]|cU8kGF_jdKP"><field name="field_flippersound_sound-selector">{"name":"Cat Meow 1","location":"device"}</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></xml>

text.content: Press the Play Button to run the program.

Tilt the Hub to the right.

Hear the sound effect coming from your device.

The sound effect will play from the speakers on your device.

Make sure your device is not muted.

code_stack.title: SPIKE TA_Gyro_Left
code_stack.xml: <xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" blockversion="11" ishorizontal="false" displaymonitorincludedimages="11"><variables></variables><block type="flipperevents_whenTilted" id="bq!iIUCi//pcw6Q;%oK)" x="249" y="346"><value name="VALUE"><shadow type="flipperevents_custom-tilted" id="e;9LD3;meFP_/V^mMLHL"><field name="field_flipperevents_custom-tilted">3</field></shadow></value></block></xml>

text.content: Change the program to make the sound effect when the Hub is tilted to the left.
Press the Play Button and test the program to hear the sound effect.
